12251083Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsCircleCollision(Di2015NewLine    int x1, int y1, int radius1,Di2015NewLine    int x2, int y2, int radius2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int dx = x2 - x1;Di2015NewLine    int dy = y2 - y1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double D = Math.Sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);Di2015NewLine    return Math.Abs(radius1-radius2)<D && D<radius1+radius2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12251083Di2015UniqueSeparatorMath.Sqrt
12251083Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsCircleCollision(Di2015NewLine    int x1, int y1, int radius1,Di2015NewLine    int x2, int y2, int radius2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int dx = x2 - x1;Di2015NewLine    int dy = y2 - y1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int Dsqr = dx*dx + dy*dy;Di2015NewLine    int rdiff = Math.Abs(radius1-radius2);Di2015NewLine    int rsum = radius1+radius2Di2015NewLine    return rdiff*rdiff<Dsqr && D<rsum*rsum;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12251193Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<Func<T, bool>> TransformToPredicate(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, int>> prodIdProperty,Di2015NewLine    int productId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Expression equals = Expression.Equal(prodIdProperty.Body,Di2015NewLine                                         Expression.Constant(productId));Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(equals, prodIdProperty.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12251193Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    static Expression<Func<T, bool>> TransformToPredicate<T>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<T, int>> prodIdProperty,Di2015NewLine        int productId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression equals = Expression.Equal(prodIdProperty.Body,Di2015NewLine                                             Expression.Constant(productId));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(equals, prodIdProperty.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<string, int>> length = x => x.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var predicate = TransformToPredicate(length, 5);Di2015NewLine        var compiled = predicate.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(compiled("Hello")); // TrueDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(compiled("Foo")); // FalseDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12261971Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StringBuilderSearchingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static bool Contains(this StringBuilder haystack, string needle)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return haystack.IndexOf(needle) != -1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public static int IndexOf(this StringBuilder haystack, string needle)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(haystack == null || needle == null)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine    if(needle.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine      return 0;//empty strings are everywhere!Di2015NewLine    if(needle.Length == 1)//can't beat just spinning through for itDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      char c = needle[0];Di2015NewLine      for(int idx = 0; idx != haystack.Length; ++idx)Di2015NewLine        if(haystack[idx] == c)Di2015NewLine          return idx;Di2015NewLine      return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int m = 0;Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    int[] T = KMPTable(needle);Di2015NewLine    while(m + i < haystack.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(needle[i] == haystack[m + i])Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if(i == needle.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine          return m == needle.Length ? -1 : m;//match -1 = failure to find conventional in .NETDi2015NewLine        ++i;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        m = m + i - T[i];Di2015NewLine        i = T[i] > -1 ? T[i] : 0;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine  }      Di2015NewLine  private static int[] KMPTable(string sought)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int[] table = new int[sought.Length];Di2015NewLine    int pos = 2;Di2015NewLine    int cnd = 0;Di2015NewLine    table[0] = -1;Di2015NewLine    table[1] = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(pos < table.Length)Di2015NewLine      if(sought[pos - 1] == sought[cnd])Di2015NewLine        table[pos++] = ++cnd;Di2015NewLine      else if(cnd > 0)Di2015NewLine        cnd = table[cnd];Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        table[pos++] = 0;Di2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12264010Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport javax.mail.*;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class readEmails {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Constructor CallDi2015NewLinepublic readEmails() {Di2015NewLine   processMail();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Responsible for printing Data to ConsoleDi2015NewLineprivate void printData(String data) {Di2015NewLine   System.out.println(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void processMail() {Di2015NewLine   Session session = null;Di2015NewLine   Store store = null;Di2015NewLine   Folder folder = null;Di2015NewLine   Message message = null;Di2015NewLine   Message[] messages = null;Di2015NewLine   Object messagecontentObject = null;Di2015NewLine   String sender = null;Di2015NewLine   String subject = null;Di2015NewLine   Multipart multipart = null;Di2015NewLine   Part part = null;Di2015NewLine   String contentType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   try {Di2015NewLine      printData("--------------processing mails started-----------------");Di2015NewLine      session = Session.getDefaultInstance(System.getProperties(), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      printData("getting the session for accessing email.");Di2015NewLine      store = session.getStore("imap");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      store.connect("host Name OR IP","username","password");Di2015NewLine      printData("Connection established with IMAP server.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Get a handle on the default folderDi2015NewLine      folder = store.getDefaultFolder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      printData("Getting the Inbox folder.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Retrieve the "Inbox"Di2015NewLine      folder = folder.getFolder("inbox");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Reading the Email Index in Read / Write ModeDi2015NewLine      folder.open(Folder.READ_WRITE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Retrieve the messagesDi2015NewLine      messages = folder.getMessages();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Loop over all of the messagesDi2015NewLine      for (int messageNumber = 0; messageNumber < messages.length; messageNumber++) {Di2015NewLine           // Retrieve the next message to be readDi2015NewLine       message = messages[messageNumber];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Retrieve the message contentDi2015NewLine           messagecontentObject = message.getContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Determine email typeDi2015NewLine           if (messagecontentObject instanceof Multipart) {Di2015NewLine               printData("Found Email with Attachment");Di2015NewLine               sender = ((InternetAddress) message.getFrom()[0]).getPersonal();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               // If the "personal" information has no entry, check the address for the sender informationDi2015NewLine               printData("If the personal information has no entry, check the address for the sender information.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if (sender == null) {Di2015NewLine           sender = ((InternetAddress) message.getFrom()[0]).getAddress();Di2015NewLine           printData("sender in NULL. Printing Address:" + sender);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine               printData("Sender -." + sender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               // Get the subject informationDi2015NewLine               subject = message.getSubject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               printData("subject=" + subject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               // Retrieve the Multipart object from the messageDi2015NewLine               multipart = (Multipart) message.getContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               printData("Retrieve the Multipart object from the message");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               // Loop over the parts of the emailDi2015NewLine               for (int i = 0; i < multipart.getCount(); i++) {Di2015NewLine                    // Retrieve the next partDi2015NewLine                    part = multipart.getBodyPart(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Get the content typeDi2015NewLine                    contentType = part.getContentType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                   // Display the content typeDi2015NewLine           printData("Content: " + contentType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                   if (contentType.startsWith("text/plain")) {Di2015NewLine            printData("---------reading content type text/plain  mail -------------");Di2015NewLine           } else {Di2015NewLine            // Retrieve the file nameDi2015NewLine            String fileName = part.getFileName();Di2015NewLine            printData("retrive the fileName="+ fileName);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine       } else {Di2015NewLine          printData("Found Mail Without Attachment");Di2015NewLine          sender = ((InternetAddress) message.getFrom()[0]).getPersonal();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              // If the "personal" information has no entry, check the address for the sender informationDi2015NewLine          printData("If the personal information has no entry, check the address for the sender information.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if (sender == null) {Di2015NewLine        sender = ((InternetAddress) message.getFrom()[0]).getAddress();Di2015NewLine        printData("sender in NULL. Printing Address:" + sender);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             // Get the subject informationDi2015NewLine         subject = message.getSubject();Di2015NewLine         printData("subject=" + subject);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Close the folderDi2015NewLine      folder.close(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Close the message storeDi2015NewLine      store.close();Di2015NewLine  } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine     printData("Not able to process the mail reading.");Di2015NewLine     e.printStackTrace();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Main  Function for The readEmail ClassDi2015NewLinepublic static void main(String args[]) {Di2015NewLine    //Creating new readEmail ObjectDi2015NewLine    readEmails readMail = new readEmails();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Calling processMail Function to read from IMAP AccountDi2015NewLine    readMail.processMail();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12264396Di2015UniqueSeparator^ // denotes start of lineDi2015NewLine (?:…) // we need to group some stuff, so we use parens, and ?: denotes that we do not want to use the parens for capturing (this is a performance optimization)Di2015NewLine .*? // denotes any character, zero or more times, until what follows (\\)Di2015NewLine \\\\ //denotes a backslash (the backslash is also escape char)Di2015NewLine {4} // repeat 4 timesDi2015NewLine

12264542Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnion
12264542Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar result1 = (from i in invoicesDi2015NewLine               let o = collections.SingleOrDefault(x => x.CurrencyID == i.CurrencyID)Di2015NewLine               select new Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  CurrencyID = i.CurrencyID,Di2015NewLine                  Value = i.Value - (o != null ? o.Value : 0)Di2015NewLine               }).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result2 =  from c in collectionsDi2015NewLine               where !result1.Any(x => x.CurrencyID == c.CurrencyID)Di2015NewLine               select new Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                CurrencyID = c.CurrencyID,Di2015NewLine                Value = c.ValueDi2015NewLine               };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = result1.Union(result2).OrderBy (r => r.Value);Di2015NewLine

Waiting for connection to port");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var socket = tcpListener.AcceptSocket();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId + " - Connection accepted");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var stream = new NetworkStream(socket);Di2015NewLine        var reader = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId + " - Disposing of socket");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        socket.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }).Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

zero.</summary>Di2015NewLine  public SharedInt(){}Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Creates a new SharedInt.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="value">The initial value of the object.</param>Di2015NewLine  public SharedInt(int value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _value = value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Returns the value of the SharedInt.</summary>Di2015NewLine  public int ValueDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get { return _value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Returns the value of the SharedInt.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="ri">The SharedInt to cast.</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>An integer of the same value as the SharedInt.</returns>Di2015NewLine  public static implicit operator int(SharedInt ri)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return ri._value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Atomically increment the value of the SharedInt by one.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The new value.</returns>Di2015NewLine  public int Increment()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Interlocked.Increment(ref _value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Atomically decrement the value of the SharedInt by one.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The new value.</returns>Di2015NewLine  public int Decrement()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Interlocked.Decrement(ref _value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Atomically add a value to the SharedInt.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="addend">The addend);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Atomically replace the value of the SharedInt, returning the previous value.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="value">The number to set the value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Atomically subtract a value from the SharedInt.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="subtrahend">The number to subtract from the -subtrahend);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12279274Di2015UniqueSeparator    public partial class FileMonitor : ServiceBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Timer timer;Di2015NewLine        private long interval;Di2015NewLine        private const string ACCEPTED_FILE_TYPE = "*.csv";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public FileMonitor()Di2015NewLine        {           Di2015NewLine            this.ServiceName = "Service";Di2015NewLine            this.CanStop = true;Di2015NewLine            this.CanPauseAndContinue = true;Di2015NewLine            this.AutoLog = true;Di2015NewLine            this.interval = long.Parse(1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ServiceBase.Run(new FileMonitor());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnStop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnStop();Di2015NewLine            this.timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnStart(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AutoResetEvent autoEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            this.timer = new Timer(new TimerCallback(ProcessNewFiles), autoEvent, interval, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ProcessNewFiles(Object stateInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime start = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            DateTime complete = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string directoryToMonitor = "c:\\mydirectory";Di2015NewLine                DirectoryInfo feedDir = new DirectoryInfo(directoryToMonitor);Di2015NewLine                FileInfo[] feeds = feedDir.GetFiles(ACCEPTED_FILE_TYPE, SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly);             Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (FileInfo feed in feeds.OrderBy(m => m.LastWriteTime))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Do whatever you want to do with the file hereDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TimeSpan t = complete.Subtract(start);Di2015NewLine                long calculatedInterval = interval - t.Milliseconds < 0 ? 0 : interval - t.Milliseconds;Di2015NewLine                this.timer.Change(calculatedInterval, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12279629Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetMinimalUsedRangeAddress(Excel.Worksheet sheet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string address = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int rowMax = 0;Di2015NewLine        int colMax = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Excel.Range usedRange = sheet.UsedRange;Di2015NewLine        Excel.Range lastCell = usedRange.SpecialCells(Excel.XlCellType.xlCellTypeLastCell, Type.Missing);Di2015NewLine        int lastRow = lastCell.Row;Di2015NewLine        int lastCol = lastCell.Column;Di2015NewLine        int rowMin = lastRow + 1;Di2015NewLine        int colMin = lastCol + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rr = usedRange.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine        int cc = usedRange.Columns.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (int r = 1; r <= rr; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int c = 1; c <= cc; c++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Excel.Range cell = usedRange.Cells[r, c] as Excel.Range;Di2015NewLine                if (cell != null && cell.Value != null && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(cell.Value.ToString()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (cell.Row > rowMax)Di2015NewLine                        rowMax = cell.Row;Di2015NewLine                    if (cell.Column > colMax)Di2015NewLine                        colMax = cell.Column;Di2015NewLine                    if (cell.Row < rowMin)Di2015NewLine                        rowMin = cell.Row;Di2015NewLine                    if (cell.Column < colMin)Di2015NewLine                        colMin = cell.Column;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                MRCO(cell);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!(rowMax == 0 || colMax == 0 || rowMin == lastRow + 1 || colMin == lastCol + 1))Di2015NewLine            address = Cells2Address(rowMin, colMin, rowMax, colMax);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MRCO(lastCell);Di2015NewLine        MRCO(usedRange);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // log as neededDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return address; // caller should test return for String.EmptyDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Cells2Address(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ColNum2Letter(col1) + row1.ToString() + ":" + ColNum2Letter(col2) + row2.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string ColNum2Letter(int colNum)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (colNum <= 26) Di2015NewLine        return ((char)(colNum + 64)).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colNum--; //decrement to put value on zero based indexDi2015NewLine    return ColNum2Letter(colNum / 26) + ColNum2Letter((colNum % 26) + 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void MRCO(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null) { return; }Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReleaseComObject(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ignore, cf: http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx/kb/317109Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        obj = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12284003Di2015UniqueSeparatorMerge
12284003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable MergeAll(this IList<DataTable> tables, String primaryKeyColumn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!tables.Any())Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Tables must not be empty", "tables");Di2015NewLine    if(primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine        foreach(DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine            if(!t.Columns.Contains(primaryKeyColumn))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("All tables must have the specified primarykey column " + primaryKeyColumn, "primaryKeyColumn");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(tables.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine        return tables[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable("TblUnion");Di2015NewLine    table.BeginLoadData(); // Turns off notifications, index maintenance, and constraints while loading dataDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        table.Merge(t); // same as table.Merge(t, false, MissingSchemaAction.Add);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // since we might have no real primary keys defined, the rows now might have repeating fieldsDi2015NewLine        // so now we're going to "join" these rows ...Di2015NewLine        var pkGroups = table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(r => r[primaryKeyColumn]);Di2015NewLine        var dupGroups = pkGroups.Where(g => g.Count() > 1);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var grpDup in dupGroups)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // use first row and modify itDi2015NewLine            DataRow firstRow = grpDup.First();Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn c in table.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (firstRow.IsNull(c))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataRow firstNotNullRow = grpDup.Skip(1).FirstOrDefault(r => !r.IsNull(c));Di2015NewLine                    if (firstNotNullRow != null)Di2015NewLine                        firstRow[c] = firstNotNullRow[c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // remove all but first rowDi2015NewLine            var rowsToRemove = grpDup.Skip(1);Di2015NewLine            foreach(DataRow rowToRemove in rowsToRemove)Di2015NewLine                table.Rows.Remove(rowToRemove);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12284708Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass HttpWebRequestBeginGetRequestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static ManualResetEvent allDone = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a new HttpWebRequest object.Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("http://www.contoso.com/example.aspx");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the Method property to 'POST' to post data to the URI.Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // start the asynchronous operationDi2015NewLine    request.BeginGetRequestStream(new AsyncCallback(GetRequestStreamCallback), request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Keep the main thread from continuing while the asynchronous Di2015NewLine    // operation completes. A real world application Di2015NewLine    // could do something useful such as updating its user interface. Di2015NewLine    allDone.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void GetRequestStreamCallback(IAsyncResult asynchronousResult)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)asynchronousResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // End the operationDi2015NewLine    Stream postStream = request.EndGetRequestStream(asynchronousResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Please enter the input data to be posted:");Di2015NewLine    string postData = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert the string into a byte array. Di2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Write to the request stream.Di2015NewLine    postStream.Write(byteArray, 0, postData.Length);Di2015NewLine    postStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start the asynchronous operation to get the responseDi2015NewLine    request.BeginGetResponse(new AsyncCallback(GetResponseCallback), request);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void GetResponseCallback(IAsyncResult asynchronousResult)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)asynchronousResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // End the operationDi2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.EndGetResponse(asynchronousResult);Di2015NewLine    Stream streamResponse = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine    StreamReader streamRead = new StreamReader(streamResponse);Di2015NewLine    string responseString = streamRead.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(responseString);Di2015NewLine    // Close the stream objectDi2015NewLine    streamResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine    streamRead.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Release the HttpWebResponseDi2015NewLine    response.Close();Di2015NewLine    allDone.Set();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12287303Di2015UniqueSeparatorThe URI syntax does not require that the scheme-specific-part haveDi2015NewLineany general structure or set of semantics which is common among allDi2015NewLineURI.  However, a subset of URI do share a common syntax forDi2015NewLinerepresenting hierarchical relationships within the namespace.  ThisDi2015NewLine"generic URI" syntax consists of a sequence of four main components:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   <scheme>://<authority><path>?<query>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineeach of which, except <scheme>, may be absent from a particular URI.Di2015NewLineFor example, some URI schemes do not allow an <authority> component,Di2015NewLineand others do not use a <query> component.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   absoluteURI   = scheme ":" ( hier_part | opaque_part )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineURI that are hierarchical in nature use the slash "/" character forDi2015NewLineseparating hierarchical components.  For some file systems, a "/"Di2015NewLinecharacter (used to denote the hierarchical structure of a URI) is theDi2015NewLinedelimiter used to construct a file name hierarchy, and thus the URIDi2015NewLinepath will look similar to a file pathname.  This does NOT imply thatDi2015NewLinethe resource is a file or that the URI maps to an actual filesystemDi2015NewLinepathname.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   hier_part     = ( net_path | abs_path ) [ "?" query ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   net_path      = "//" authority [ abs_path ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   abs_path      = "/"  path_segmentsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineURI that do not make use of the slash "/" character for separatingDi2015NewLinehierarchical components are considered opaque by the generic URIDi2015NewLineparser.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   opaque_part   = uric_no_slash *uricDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   uric_no_slash = unreserved | escaped | ";" | "?" | ":" | "@" |Di2015NewLine                   "&" | "=" | "+" | "$" | ","Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWe use the term <path> to refer to both the <abs_path> andDi2015NewLine<opaque_part> constructs, since they are mutually exclusive for anyDi2015NewLinegiven URI and can be parsed as a single component.Di2015NewLine

12295031Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class IntObjDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public readonly int Value;Di2015NewLine    public IntObj(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Run(1, 0, false);Di2015NewLine        Run(100000, 500, true);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Run(int length, int repeat, bool report)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = new object[length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int chk = 0;Di2015NewLine        var watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < repeat; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data[i] = i;Di2015NewLine                chk += i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        if(report) Console.WriteLine("Box: {0}ms (chk: {1})", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, chk);Di2015NewLine        chk = 0;Di2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < repeat; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                chk += (int) data[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        if (report) Console.WriteLine("Unbox: {0}ms (chk: {1})", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, chk);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        chk = 0;Di2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < repeat; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data[i] = new IntObj(i);Di2015NewLine                chk += i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        if (report) Console.WriteLine("Wrap: {0}ms (chk: {1})", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, chk);Di2015NewLine        chk = 0;Di2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < repeat; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                chk += ((IntObj)data[i]).Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        if (report) Console.WriteLine("Unwrap: {0}ms (chk: {1})", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, chk);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12299076Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int WH_MOUSE_LL = 14;Di2015NewLine    private const int WM_MOUSEMOVE = 0x200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern IntPtr GetModuleHandle(string moduleName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern IntPtr SetWindowsHookEx(int idHook, HookProc lpfn, IntPtr hMod, uint dwThreadId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int UnhookWindowsHookEx(IntPtr hhook);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern IntPtr CallNextHookEx(IntPtr hhk, int nCode, uint wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLine    delegate IntPtr HookProc(int nCode, uint wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct MSLLHOOKSTRUCTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public POINT pt;Di2015NewLine        public int mouseData; // be careful, this must be ints, not uints (was wrong before I changed it...). regards, cmew.Di2015NewLine        public int flags;Di2015NewLine        public int time;Di2015NewLine        public UIntPtr dwExtraInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct POINTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int X;Di2015NewLine        public int Y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private HookProc hookProc;Di2015NewLine    private IntPtr hook;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private POINT formerPoint = new POINT() { X = 0, Y = 0 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1() { InitializeComponent(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr LowLevelMouseProc(int nCode, uint wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (wParam == WM_MOUSEMOVE)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MSLLHOOKSTRUCT infoStr = (MSLLHOOKSTRUCT)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(MSLLHOOKSTRUCT));Di2015NewLine            if (infoStr.pt.X == formerPoint.X && infoStr.pt.Y == formerPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Mouse moved without coordinates changing");Di2015NewLine                //use the standard way of finding the direction of travel here.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            formerPoint = infoStr.pt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return CallNextHookEx(IntPtr.Zero, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnHandleDestroyed(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UnhookWindowsHookEx(hook);Di2015NewLine        base.OnHandleDestroyed(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnLoad(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnLoad(e);Di2015NewLine        if (!DesignMode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hookProc = new HookProc(LowLevelMouseProc);Di2015NewLine            hook = SetWindowsHookEx(WH_MOUSE_LL, hookProc, GetModuleHandle(null), 0);Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12300537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoggingHandler : DelegatingHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LogRequest(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken).ContinueWith(task =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var response = task.Result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LogResponse(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LogRequest(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        (request.Content ?? new StringContent("")).ReadAsStringAsync().ContinueWith(x =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Logger.Info("{4:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} {5} {0} request [{1}]{2} - {3}", request.GetCorrelationId(), request.Method, request.RequestUri, x.Result, DateTime.Now, Username(request));Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LogResponse(HttpResponseMessage response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = response.RequestMessage;Di2015NewLine        (response.Content ?? new StringContent("")).ReadAsStringAsync().ContinueWith(x =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Logger.Info("{3:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} {4} {0} response [{1}] - {2}", request.GetCorrelationId(), response.StatusCode, x.Result, DateTime.Now, Username(request));Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string Username(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = new List<string>().AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine        if (request.Headers.TryGetValues("my-custom-header-for-current-user", out values) == false) return "<anonymous>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return values.First(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1) 'Shorten command by 1 charDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        Console.CursorLeft = 0 'Set the cursor to the beginning of the lineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(command) 'Write the command to the screenDi2015NewLine    ElseIf cki.Key = ConsoleKey.Enter Then 'Command has been submitted, start checkingDi2015NewLine        Console.CursorLeft = 0 'Set the cursor to the beginning of the lineDi2015NewLine        For i As Integer = 0 To Len(command)Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(" ") 'Clear output from command (hides the executed command)Di2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        Dim tempCMD As String = commandDi2015NewLine        command = ""Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'If/then statements for validating command goes hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        command = "" 'Clear command to allow new inputDi2015NewLine    ElseDi2015NewLine        command += cki.KeyChar 'Add char to command stringDi2015NewLine        Console.CursorLeft = 0 'Set the cursor to the beginning of the lineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(command) 'Write the command to the screenDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    ConsoleInput() 'Loop for more input Di2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSub TextOut(ByVal message As String)Di2015NewLine    If command <> "" ThenDi2015NewLine        For i As Integer = 0 To Len(command)Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(" ") 'Clears output in case output is shorter than current commandDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        Console.CursorLeft = 0 'Sets cursor to beginning of rowDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(message) 'Writes the current message to the screenDi2015NewLine    If message <> command ThenDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(command) 'Writes the command back to the screenDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

12313166Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SerializerFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // hashtable has better threading semantics than dictionary, honest!Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Hashtable cache = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine    public static IMessageSerializer Create(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var found = (IMessageSerializer)cache[t];Di2015NewLine        if(found != null) return found;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock(cache)Di2015NewLine        {   // double-checkedDi2015NewLine            found = (IMessageSerializer)cache[t];Di2015NewLine            if(found != null) return found;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var types = new List<Type> { t };Di2015NewLine            var mapper = new MessageMapper();Di2015NewLine            mapper.Initialize(types);Di2015NewLine            var serializer = new XmlMessageSerializer(mapper);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            serializer.Initialize(types);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            cache[t] = serializer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return serializer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        if (ScrollViewer.IsMouseOver)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the new scroll position.Di2015NewLine            Point point = e.GetPosition(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Determine the new amount to scroll.Di2015NewLine            Point delta = new Point(Di2015NewLine                (point.X > this.scrollStartPoint.X) ?Di2015NewLine                    -(point.X - this.scrollStartPoint.X) :Di2015NewLine                    (this.scrollStartPoint.X - point.X),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                (point.Y > this.scrollStartPoint.Y) ?Di2015NewLine                    -(point.Y - this.scrollStartPoint.Y) :Di2015NewLine                    (this.scrollStartPoint.Y - point.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Scroll to the new position.Di2015NewLine            ScrollViewer.ScrollToHorizontalOffset(Di2015NewLine                this.scrollStartOffset.X + delta.X);Di2015NewLine            ScrollViewer.ScrollToVerticalOffset(Di2015NewLine                this.scrollStartOffset.Y + delta.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 12318636Di2015UniqueSeparatorTraverse
12318636Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> fnRecurse)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> seqRecurse = fnRecurse(item);Di2015NewLine        if (seqRecurse != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (T itemRecurse in Traverse(seqRecurse, fnRecurse))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return itemRecurse;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12319663Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a detector that tests if a locationDi2015NewLine// contains 1 and returns 'false' when out of rangeDi2015NewLinelet one = border false (equals 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A shape detector for your patternDi2015NewLinelet pattern = Di2015NewLine  around (0, 0) one <&> around (1, 0) one <&> Di2015NewLine  around (-1, 1) oneDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Test pattern with any rotation: Combine Di2015NewLine// 4 possible rotations with logical or.Di2015NewLinelet any = Di2015NewLine  pattern <|> rotate pattern <|> Di2015NewLine  rotate (rotate pattern) <|> Di2015NewLine  rotate (rotate (rotate pattern))Di2015NewLine
12319663Di2015UniqueSeparatorany
12319663Di2015UniqueSeparator/// A type that represents a function that testsDi2015NewLine/// whether an array contains some pattern at a Di2015NewLine/// specified location. It gets the location to Di2015NewLine/// test & the array as arguments and returns bool.Di2015NewLinetype ShapeDetector = SD of (int -> int -> int[,] -> bool)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// A primitive that tests whether the value at theDi2015NewLine/// current location contains a value 'v'Di2015NewLinelet equals v = SD (fun x y arr -> arr.[x,y] = v)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// A combinator that takes 'ShapeDetector' and Di2015NewLine/// creates a new one that returns 'def' when Di2015NewLine/// accessing outside of the array boundsDi2015NewLinelet border def (SD f) = SD (fun x y arr -> Di2015NewLine  if x < 0 || y < 0 || x >= arr.GetLength(0) || y >= arr.GetLength(1) Di2015NewLine  then def else f x y arr)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// A combinator that calls a given ShapeDetectorDi2015NewLine/// at a location specified by offset dx, dyDi2015NewLinelet around (dx, dy) (SD f) = SD (fun x y arr ->Di2015NewLine  f (x + dx) (y + dy) arr)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// A combinator that takes a ShapeDetector andDi2015NewLine/// builds a new one, which is rotated by 90 degreesDi2015NewLinelet rotate (SD f) = SD (fun x y arr ->Di2015NewLine  f -y x arr)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// Creates a shape detector that succeeds onlyDi2015NewLine/// when both of the arguments succeed.Di2015NewLinelet (<&>) (SD f1) (SD f2) = SD (fun x y arr ->Di2015NewLine  f1 x y arr && f2 x y arr)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// Creates a shape detector that succeeds Di2015NewLine/// when either of the arguments succeed.Di2015NewLinelet (<|>) (SD f1) (SD f2) = SD (fun x y arr ->Di2015NewLine  f1 x y arr || f2 x y arr)Di2015NewLine
12319663Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a 2D array as a sample inputDi2015NewLinelet inp = Di2015NewLine  array2D [ [ 0; 0; 1 ]Di2015NewLine            [ 0; 1; 0 ]Di2015NewLine            [ 0; 1; 0 ] ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the underlying function and run itDi2015NewLine// for all possible indices in the arrayDi2015NewLinelet (SD f) = anyDi2015NewLinefor x in 0 .. 2 doDi2015NewLine  for y in 0 .. 2 doDi2015NewLine    printfn "%A %A" (x, y) (f x y inp)Di2015NewLine

12321151Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string EncodeBase36(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Contract.Requires<ArgumentException>(i>=0);Di2015NewLine  //Base conversionDi2015NewLine  string s="";Di2015NewLine  while(i!=0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int digit = i % 36;Di2015NewLine    i/=36;Di2015NewLine    if(digit<10)Di2015NewLine      s=((char)('0'+digit)).ToString()+s;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      s=((char)('a'+digit-10)).ToString()+s;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  // Enforce minimum lengthDi2015NewLine  while(s.Length<3)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    s = "0" + s;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return s;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12322548Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SortExpressionBuilder<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static IDictionary<SortDirection, ISortExpression> directions =  new Dictionary<SortDirection, ISortExpression>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { SortDirection.Ascending, new OrderByAscendingSortExpression() },Di2015NewLine        { SortDirection.Descending, new OrderByDescendingSortExpression() }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    interface ISortExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, object>, IEnumerable<T>> GetExpression();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class OrderByAscendingSortExpression : ISortExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, object>, IEnumerable<T>> GetExpression()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (c, f) => c.OrderBy(f);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class OrderByDescendingSortExpression : ISortExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, object>, IEnumerable<T>> GetExpression()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (c, f) => c.OrderByDescending(f);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, object>, IEnumerable<T>> CreateExpression(SortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return directions[direction].GetExpression();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IEnumerable<T> collection, string columnName, SortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x"); // xDi2015NewLine    Expression property = Expression.Property(param, columnName);     // x.ColumnNameDi2015NewLine    Func<T, object> func = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, object>>(        // x => x.ColumnNameDi2015NewLine       Expression.Convert(Expression.Property(param, columnName), Di2015NewLine       typeof(object)), paramDi2015NewLine    ).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, object>, IEnumerable<T>> expression = SortExpressionBuilder<T>.CreateExpression(direction);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> sorted = expression(collection, func);Di2015NewLine    return sorted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12328880Di2015UniqueSeparator// after your call to MatchTemplateDi2015NewLinefloat threshold = 0.08;Di2015NewLinecv::Mat thresholdedImage;Di2015NewLinecv::threshold(result, thresholdedImage, threshold, 255, CV_THRESH_BINARY);Di2015NewLine// the above will set pixels to 0 in thresholdedImage if their value in result is lower than the threshold, to 255 if it is larger.Di2015NewLine// in C++ it could also be written cv::Mat thresholdedImage = result < threshold;Di2015NewLine// Now loop over pixels of thresholdedImage, and draw your matchesDi2015NewLinefor (int r = 0; r < thresholdedImage.rows; ++r) {Di2015NewLine  for (int c = 0; c < thresholdedImage.cols; ++c) {Di2015NewLine    if (!thresholdedImage.at<unsigned char>(r, c)) // = thresholdedImage(r,c) == 0Di2015NewLine      cv::circle(sourceColor, cv::Point(c, r), template.cols/2, CV_RGB(0,255,0), 1);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12335905Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    abstract class aBazDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public abstract int A { get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    interface IBarDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int B { get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class FooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int C { get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BarableFoo : Foo, IBarDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int C { get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is why the compiler doesn't error on the later castDi2015NewLine        Foo foo = new BarableFoo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compiler error: aBaz is a class and the compiler knows thatDi2015NewLine        // Foo is not a _subclass_ of aBaz.Di2015NewLine        aBaz baz = (aBaz)foo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // no compiler error: the class Foo does not implement IBar, however at runtimeDi2015NewLine        // this instance, "foo", might be a subclass of Foo that _implements_ IBar.Di2015NewLine        // This is perfectly valid, and succeeds at runtime.Di2015NewLine        IBar bar = (IBar)foo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // On the other hand...Di2015NewLine        foo = new Foo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This fails at runtime as expected. Di2015NewLine        bar = (IBar)foo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12338560Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Windows.Security.Cryptography.Core;Di2015NewLineusing Windows.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing Windows.Storage.Streams;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine// Use Password Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2 or RFC2898)Di2015NewLineKeyDerivationAlgorithmProvider pbkdf2 = Di2015NewLine    KeyDerivationAlgorithmProvider.OpenAlgorithm(Di2015NewLine        KeyDerivationAlgorithmNames.Pbkdf2Sha256);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Do not store passwords in strings if you can avoid them. TheDi2015NewLine// password may be retained in memory until it is garbage collected.Di2015NewLine// Crashing the application and looking at the memory dump may Di2015NewLine// reveal it.Di2015NewLineIBuffer passwordBuffer = Di2015NewLine     CryptographicBuffer.ConvertStringToBinary("password", Di2015NewLine         BinaryStringEncoding.Utf8);Di2015NewLineCryptographicKey key = pbkdf2.CreateKey(passwordBuffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use random salt and 10,000 iterations. Store the salt along with Di2015NewLine// the derviedBytes (see below).Di2015NewLineIBuffer salt = CryptographicBuffer.GenerateRandom(32);Di2015NewLineKeyDerivationParameters parameters = Di2015NewLine    KeyDerivationParameters.BuildForPbkdf2(salt, 10000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Store the returned 32 bytes along with the salt for later verificationDi2015NewLinebyte[] derviedBytes = Di2015NewLine    CryptographicEngine.DeriveKeyMaterial(key, parameters, 32).ToArray();Di2015NewLine
12338560Di2015UniqueSeparator// Use AES, CBC mode with PKCS#7 padding (good default choice)Di2015NewLineSymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider aesCbcPkcs7 = Di2015NewLine    SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.OpenAlgorithm(SymmetricAlgorithmNames.AesCbcPkcs7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create an AES 128-bit (16 byte) keyDi2015NewLineCryptographicKey key = Di2015NewLine    aesCbcPkcs7.CreateSymmetricKey(CryptographicBuffer.GenerateRandom(16));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Creata a 16 byte initialization vectorDi2015NewLineIBuffer iv = CryptographicBuffer.GenerateRandom(aesCbcPkcs7.BlockLength);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Encrypt the dataDi2015NewLinebyte[] plainText = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("Hello, world!"); // Data to encryptDi2015NewLinebyte[] cipherText = CryptographicEngine.Encrypt(Di2015NewLine    key, plainText.AsBuffer(), iv).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Decrypt the dataDi2015NewLinestring newPlainText = new string(Di2015NewLine    Encoding.UTF8.GetChars(CryptographicEngine.Decrypt(Di2015NewLine        key, cipherText.AsBuffer(), iv).ToArray()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// newPlainText contains "Hello, world!"Di2015NewLine

12342208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DelayedExecutionServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void DelayedExecute(Action action, int delay = 3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dispatcherTimer = new System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLine        handler = (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Stop the timer so it won't keep executing every X secondsDi2015NewLine            // and also avoid keeping the handler in memory.Di2015NewLine            dispatcherTimer.Tick -= handler;Di2015NewLine            dispatcherTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Perform the action.Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dispatcherTimer.Tick += handler;Di2015NewLine        dispatcherTimer.Interval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(delay);Di2015NewLine        dispatcherTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12342744Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void Write7BitEncodedInt(int value) {Di2015NewLine        // Write out an int 7 bits at a time.  The high bit of the byte, Di2015NewLine        // when on, tells reader to continue reading more bytes. Di2015NewLine        uint v = (uint) value;   // support negative numbersDi2015NewLine        while (v >= 0x80) { Di2015NewLine            Write((byte) (v | 0x80));Di2015NewLine            v >>= 7;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Write((byte)v); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12348124Di2015UniqueSeparatorWriteToStreamAsync
12348124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override Task WriteToStreamAsync(Di2015NewLine    Type type, Di2015NewLine    object value,Di2015NewLine    Stream stream,Di2015NewLine    HttpContent content,Di2015NewLine    TransportContext transportContextDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(JsonpCallbackFunction))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return base.WriteToStreamAsync(type, value, stream, content, transportContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // write the JSONP pre-ambleDi2015NewLine    var preamble = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(JsonpCallbackFunction + "(");Di2015NewLine    stream.Write(preamble, 0, preamble.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return base.WriteToStreamAsync(type, value, stream, content, transportContext).ContinueWith((innerTask, state) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (innerTask.Status == TaskStatus.RanToCompletion)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // write the JSONP suffixDi2015NewLine            var responseStream = (Stream)state;Di2015NewLine            var suffix = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(")");Di2015NewLine            responseStream.Write(suffix, 0, suffix.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }, stream, TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12357425Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing FS.Mes.Client.Mvvm.MvvmTools.MvvmLight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace FS.Mes.Client.Mvvm.MvvmToolsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Our implementation of ObservableCollection. This fixes one significant limitation in the .NET Framework implementation. When itemsDi2015NewLine    /// are added or removed from an observable collection, the OnCollectionChanged event is fired for each item. Depending on how the collectionDi2015NewLine    /// is bound, this can cause significant performance issues. This implementation gets around this by suppressing the notification until allDi2015NewLine    /// items are added or removed. This implementation is also thread safe. Operations against this collection are always done on the thread thatDi2015NewLine    /// owns the collection.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Collection type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    public class FsObservableCollection<T> : ObservableCollection<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region [Constructor]Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// ConstructorDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public FsObservableCollection()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DispatcherHelper.Initialize();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region [Public Properties]Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets a property that determines if we are delaying notifications on updates.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public bool DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Add a range of IEnumerable items to the observable collection and optionally delay notification until the operation is complete.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="items"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="delayCollectionChangedNotification">Value indicating whether delay notification will be turned on/off</param>Di2015NewLine        public void AddRange(IEnumerable<T> items, bool delayCollectionChangedNotification = true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (items == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("items");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DoDispatchedAction(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification = delayCollectionChangedNotification;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Do we have any items to add?Di2015NewLine                if (items.Any())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine                            this.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    finallyDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // We're done. Turn delay notification off and call the OnCollectionChanged() method and tell it we had a 'dramatic' changeDi2015NewLine                        // in the collection.Di2015NewLine                        DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification = false;Di2015NewLine                        this.OnCollectionChanged(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Clear the items in the ObservableCollection and optionally delay notification until the operation is complete.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void ClearItems(bool delayCollectionChangedNotification = true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Do we have anything to remove?Di2015NewLine            if (!this.Any())Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DoDispatchedAction(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification = delayCollectionChangedNotification;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    this.Clear();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // We're done. Turn delay notification off and call the OnCollectionChanged() method and tell it we had a 'dramatic' changeDi2015NewLine                    // in the collection.Di2015NewLine                    DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification = false;Di2015NewLine                    this.OnCollectionChanged(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Override the virtual OnCollectionChanged() method on the ObservableCollection class.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">Event arguments</param>Di2015NewLine        protected override void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DoDispatchedAction(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!DelayOnCollectionChangedNotification)Di2015NewLine                    base.OnCollectionChanged(e);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Makes sure 'action' is executed on the thread that owns the object. Otherwise, things will go boom.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        ///<param name="action">The action which should be executed</param>Di2015NewLine        private static void DoDispatchedAction(Action action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DispatcherHelper.CheckInvokeOnUI(action);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12358510Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MvcHtmlString MyHelper<TModel,object>(Di2015NewLine    this HtmlHelper<TModel> helper, Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TModel,object>> expression) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newExpression = expression.Body as NewExpression;Di2015NewLine        TModel model = helper.ViewData.Model;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (MemberExpression a in newExpression.Arguments) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var propertyName = a.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine            var propertyValue = GetPropertyValue<TModel>(model, a);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Do whatever you need to with the property name and value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object GetPropertyValue<T>(T instance, MemberExpression me) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (me.Expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.Parameter) {Di2015NewLine            // If the current MemberExpression is at the root object, set that as the target.            Di2015NewLine            target = instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {                Di2015NewLine            target = GetPropertyValue<T>(instance, me.Expression as MemberExpression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the value from current MemberExpression against the current targetDi2015NewLine        return target.GetType().GetProperty(me.Member.Name).GetValue(target, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12358608Di2015UniqueSeparator    static private void WriteMMF()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // data that we write to the file. we will get this a tcpDi2015NewLine        var data = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("Hello World 2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var fileStream = new FileStream(@"C:\\Temp\\SomeFile.txt", FileMode.Create, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryMappedFile memoryMapped = MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(fileStream, "MapName", 1024,Di2015NewLine            MemoryMappedFileAccess.ReadWrite, new MemoryMappedFileSecurity(), HandleInheritability.Inheritable, true))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var viewStream = memoryMapped.CreateViewStream();Di2015NewLine            viewStream.Write(data, 0, data.Length); // write hello world                                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Writing MMF");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WriteMMF();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done. 12358907Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This method returns a list of registry values from a given key in .reg format.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="key">Registry key from which to obtain values.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A CR-separated list of all the registry values for a given key.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string ParseChildValues(RegistryKey key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (key.IsNull())Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(string val in key.GetValueNames())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("{0}=\\"{1}\\"", string.IsNullOrEmpty(val) ? "@" : val, key.GetValue(val));Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Parses the SubKeys of a given RegistryKey.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="key">A registry key</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Lots of important data!</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string ParseKey(RegistryKey key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (key.IsNull())Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendFormat("[{0}]", key.Name);Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(ParseChildValues(key));Di2015NewLine    foreach (var subKey in key.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(ParseKey(key.OpenSubKey(subKey)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Dump the contents of HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\\*Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Getting the contents of HKCR\\\\* on the local machine");Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey localHKCR = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("*", RegistryKeyPermissionCheck.ReadSubTree);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ParseKey(localHKCR));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Dump the contents of HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\\* on a remote machine.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Getting the contents of HKCR\\\\* via OpenRemoteBaseKey");Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey remoteHKCR = RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(RegistryHive.ClassesRoot, "MACHINENAME");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ParseKey(remoteHKCR.OpenSubKey("*", RegistryKeyPermissionCheck.ReadSubTree)));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12359634Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] SerializeObject<T>(T obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BinaryFormatter xs = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine            xs.Serialize(memoryStream, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static T DeserializeObject<T>(byte[] xml)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BinaryFormatter xs = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(xml);Di2015NewLine    return (T)xs.Deserialize(memoryStream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12363086Di2015UniqueSeparator for (Double t = 0; t<=1; t += 0.01)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      s = (1 - t) / 2;Di2015NewLineP(t)x = s(-t3 + 2t2 – t)P1X + s(-t3 + t2)P2X + (2t3 – 3t2 + 1)P2X + s(t3 – 2t2 + t)P3X + (-2t3 + 3t2)P3X + s(t3 – t2)P4XDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineP(t)y = s(-t3 + 2t2 – t)P1Y + s(-t3 + t2)P2Y + (2t3 – 3t2 + 1)P2Y + s(t3 – 2t2 + t)P3Y+ (-2t3 + 3t2)P3Y + s(t3 – t2)P4YDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif(P(t)x=>xtarget)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinereturn P(t)y;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12364877Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ProccessBitmap(Bitmap img, Bitmap original_cell)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int cellWidth = img.Width / 24;Di2015NewLine        int cellHeight = img.Height / 4;Di2015NewLine        IList<KeyValuePair<float, Rectangle>> table = new List<KeyValuePair<float, Rectangle>>();Di2015NewLine        Bitmap cell;Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AForge.Imaging.ExhaustiveTemplateMatching tm = new AForge.Imaging.ExhaustiveTemplateMatching(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < 4; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int colIndex = 0; colIndex < 24; colIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rect = new Rectangle(colIndex * cellWidth, rowIndex * cellHeight, cellWidth, cellHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cell = img.Clone(rect, img.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var matchings = tm.ProcessImage(original_cell, cell);Di2015NewLine                table.Add(new KeyValuePair<float, Rectangle>(matchings[0].Similarity, rect));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cell.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Graphics gr = Graphics.FromImage(img))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gr.DrawRectangles(new Pen(Color.Red, 3.0f), table.OrderBy(a => a.Key).Take(24).Select(a => a.Value).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Image = img;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12365549Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   const int MAX_BUFFER_SIZE = 2048;Di2015NewLine   static Encoding enc8 = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static void Main()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      FileStream fStream = new FileStream(@".\\Utf8Example.txt", FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine      string contents = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // If file size is small, read in a single operation. Di2015NewLine      if (fStream.Length <= MAX_BUFFER_SIZE) {Di2015NewLine         Byte[] bytes = new Byte[fStream.Length];Di2015NewLine         fStream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine         contents = enc8.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      // If file size exceeds buffer size, perform multiple reads. Di2015NewLine      else {Di2015NewLine         contents = ReadFromBuffer(fStream);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      fStream.Close();Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(contents);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static string ReadFromBuffer(FileStream fStream)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        Byte[] bytes = new Byte[MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine        string output = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        Decoder decoder8 = enc8.GetDecoder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (fStream.Position < fStream.Length) {Di2015NewLine           int nBytes = fStream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine           int nChars = decoder8.GetCharCount(bytes, 0, nBytes);Di2015NewLine           char[] chars = new char[nChars];Di2015NewLine           nChars = decoder8.GetChars(bytes, 0, nBytes, chars, 0);Di2015NewLine           output += new String(chars, 0, nChars);                                                     Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// The example displays the following output: Di2015NewLine//     This is a UTF-8-encoded file that contains primarily Latin text, although it Di2015NewLine//     does list the first twelve letters of the Russian (Cyrillic) alphabet: Di2015NewLine//      Di2015NewLine//     ? б в г д е ё ж з и й к Di2015NewLine//      Di2015NewLine//     The goal is to save this file, then open and decode it as a binary stream.Di2015NewLine

12371762Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int Count = 10000000;Di2015NewLineconst string testString = "<whatever>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Solution No. 1: use Regex.Match()    Di2015NewLineStopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinesw.Start();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var match = Regex.Match(@"\\[\\s*(\\d+)\\s*\\]$", testString);Di2015NewLine    if (!match.Success)Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine    var number = int.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesw.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Solution No. 2: use IndexOf() and Substring() shenanigansDi2015NewLinesw.Start();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lb = testString.IndexOf('[');Di2015NewLine    var rb = testString.LastIndexOf(']');Di2015NewLine    if (lb < 0 || rb != testString.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine    var str = testString.Substring(lb + 1, rb - lb - 1);Di2015NewLine    int number;Di2015NewLine    if (!int.TryParse(str, out number))Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine    // use the numberDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesw.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine

12373723Di2015UniqueSeparator   static class ExceptionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<TIn> Catch<TIn>(Di2015NewLine            this IEnumerable<TIn> source,Di2015NewLine            Type exceptionType)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    using (var e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ok = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ok = e.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ex.GetType() != exceptionType)Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!ok)Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return e.Current;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12373999Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Makes a shallow copy of an entity object. This works much like a MemberwiseCloneDi2015NewLine    /// but directly instantiates a new object and copies only properties that work withDi2015NewLine    /// EF and don't have the NotMappedAttribute.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TEntity">The entity type.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The source entity.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static TEntity ShallowCopyEntity<TEntity>(TEntity source) where TEntity : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get properties from EF that are read/write and not marked witht he NotMappedAttributeDi2015NewLine        var sourceProperties = typeof(TEntity)Di2015NewLine                                .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                                .Where(p => p.CanRead && p.CanWrite &&Di2015NewLine                                            p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.NotMappedAttribute), true).Length == 0);Di2015NewLine        var newObj = new TEntity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in sourceProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy valueDi2015NewLine            property.SetValue(newObj, property.GetValue(source, null), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newObj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12374312Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Dictionary(final RandomAccessFile raf) throws IOException {Di2015NewLinedictFileVersion = raf.readInt();Di2015NewLineif (dictFileVersion < 0 || dictFileVersion > CURRENT_DICT_VERSION) {Di2015NewLine  throw new IOException("Invalid dictionary version: " + dictFileVersion);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecreationMillis = raf.readLong();Di2015NewLinedictInfo = raf.readUTF();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Load the sources, then seek past them, because reading them later disrupts the offset.Di2015NewLinetry {Di2015NewLine  final RAFList<EntrySource> rafSources = RAFList.create(raf, new EntrySource.Serializer(this), raf.getFilePointer());Di2015NewLine  sources = new ArrayList<EntrySource>(rafSources);Di2015NewLine  raf.seek(rafSources.getEndOffset());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  pairEntries = CachingList.create(RAFList.create(raf, new PairEntry.Serializer(this), raf.getFilePointer()), CACHE_SIZE);Di2015NewLine  textEntries = CachingList.create(RAFList.create(raf, new TextEntry.Serializer(this), raf.getFilePointer()), CACHE_SIZE);Di2015NewLine  if (dictFileVersion >= 5) {Di2015NewLine    htmlEntries = CachingList.create(RAFList.create(raf, new HtmlEntry.Serializer(this), raf.getFilePointer()), CACHE_SIZE);Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    htmlEntries = Collections.emptyList();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  indices = CachingList.createFullyCached(RAFList.create(raf, indexSerializer, raf.getFilePointer()));Di2015NewLine} catch (RuntimeException e) {Di2015NewLine  final IOException ioe = new IOException("RuntimeException loading dictionary");Di2015NewLine  ioe.initCause(e);Di2015NewLine  throw ioe;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefinal String end = raf.readUTF(); Di2015NewLineif (!end.equals(END_OF_DICTIONARY)) {Di2015NewLine  throw new IOException("Dictionary seems corrupt: " + end);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12374378Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool TryGetCurrencySymbol(string ISOCurrencySymbol, out string symbol)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    symbol = CultureInfoDi2015NewLine        .GetCultures(CultureTypes.AllCultures)Di2015NewLine        .Where(c => !c.IsNeutralCulture)Di2015NewLine        .Select(culture => {Di2015NewLine            try{Di2015NewLine                return new RegionInfo(culture.LCID);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .Where(ri => ri!=null && ri.ISOCurrencySymbol == ISOCurrencySymbol)Di2015NewLine        .Select(ri => ri.CurrencySymbol)Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    return symbol != null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
