12374378Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class CurrencyToolsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static IDictionary<string,string> map;Di2015NewLine    static CurrencyTools()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        map = CultureInfoDi2015NewLine            .GetCultures(CultureTypes.AllCultures)Di2015NewLine            .Where(c => !c.IsNeutralCulture)Di2015NewLine            .Select(culture => {Di2015NewLine                try{Di2015NewLine                    return new RegionInfo(culture.LCID);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catchDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            })Di2015NewLine            .Where(ri => ri!=null)Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(ri => ri.ISOCurrencySymbol)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x => x.First().CurrencySymbol);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool TryGetCurrencySymbol(Di2015NewLine                          string ISOCurrencySymbol, Di2015NewLine                          out string symbol)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return map.TryGetValue(ISOCurrencySymbol,out symbol);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12376268Di2015UniqueSeparator// Given a document name, inserts a new worksheet.Di2015NewLinepublic static void InsertWorksheet(string docName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Open the document for editing.Di2015NewLine    using (SpreadsheetDocument spreadSheet = SpreadsheetDocument.Open(docName, true))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add a blank WorksheetPart.Di2015NewLine        WorksheetPart newWorksheetPart = spreadSheet.WorkbookPart.AddNewPart<WorksheetPart>();Di2015NewLine        newWorksheetPart.Worksheet = new Worksheet(new SheetData());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Sheets sheets = spreadSheet.WorkbookPart.Workbook.GetFirstChild<Sheets>();Di2015NewLine        string relationshipId = spreadSheet.WorkbookPart.GetIdOfPart(newWorksheetPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get a unique ID for the new worksheet.Di2015NewLine        uint sheetId = 1;Di2015NewLine        if (sheets.Elements<Sheet>().Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sheetId = sheets.Elements<Sheet>().Select(s => s.SheetId.Value).Max() + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Give the new worksheet a name.Di2015NewLine        string sheetName = "Sheet" + sheetId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Append the new worksheet and associate it with the workbook.Di2015NewLine        Sheet sheet = new Sheet() { Id = relationshipId, SheetId = sheetId, Name = sheetName };Di2015NewLine        sheets.Append(sheet);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12382407Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<List<int>> GetSomeInt(List<int> mainList, Di2015NewLine                                         int startIndex, int step)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLine    mainList.ForEach(queue.Enqueue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Enumerable.Range(0, startIndex)Di2015NewLine        .ToList()Di2015NewLine        .ForEach(i => queue.Enqueue(queue.Dequeue()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = queue.Take(step).ToList();Di2015NewLine        list.ForEach(i => queue.Enqueue(queue.Dequeue()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result.Any(l => l.All(list.Contains)))Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result.Add(list.ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12385355Di2015UniqueSeparator// Method from the linked answer, copy-pasted here for completenessDi2015NewLine// added the relevant fields because the original code is an overrideDi2015NewLinepublic Int32 GetNewRandomNumber(Int32 minValue, Int32 maxValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RNGCryptoServiceProvider _rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    byte[] _uInt32Buffer = new byte[4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (minValue > maxValue) Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minValue");Di2015NewLine    if (minValue == maxValue) return minValue;Di2015NewLine    Int64 diff = maxValue - minValue;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _rng.GetBytes(_uint32Buffer);Di2015NewLine        UInt32 rand = BitConverter.ToUInt32(_uint32Buffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int64 max = (1 + (Int64)UInt32.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine        Int64 remainder = max % diff;Di2015NewLine        if (rand < max - remainder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Int32)(minValue + (rand % diff));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void RandomWait(int minWait, int maxWait)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Thread.Sleep() wants a number of milliseconds to waitDi2015NewLine    // We're going, as an example, to wait between 8 and 16 secondsDi2015NewLine    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(GetNewRandomNumber(8, 16) * 1000);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12386817Di2015UniqueSeparator[Flags]Di2015NewLinepublic enum HourRepTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  None = 0,Di2015NewLine  Twelve = 1,Di2015NewLine  TwentyFour = 2,Di2015NewLine  Both = Twelve | TwentyFourDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static HourRepType FormatStringHourType(string format, CultureInfo culture = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(string.IsNullOrEmpty(format))Di2015NewLine    format = "G";//null or empty is treated as general, long time.Di2015NewLine  if(culture == null)Di2015NewLine    culture = CultureInfo.CurrentCulture;//allow null as a shortcut for thisDi2015NewLine  if(format.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine    switch(format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      case "O": case "o": case "R": case "r": case "s": case "u":Di2015NewLine        return HourRepType.TwentyFour;//always the case for these formats.Di2015NewLine      case "m": case "M": case "y": case "Y":Di2015NewLine        return HourRepType.None;//always the case for these formats.Di2015NewLine      case "d":Di2015NewLine          return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "D":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.LongDatePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "f":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.LongDatePattern + " " + culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "F":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.FullDateTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "g":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern + " " + culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "G":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern + " " + culture.DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "t":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      case "T":Di2015NewLine        return CustomFormatStringHourType(culture.DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern);Di2015NewLine      default:Di2015NewLine        throw new FormatException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  return CustomFormatStringHourType(format);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static HourRepType CustomFormatStringHourType(string format)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  format = new Regex(@"('.*')|("".*"")|(\\\\.)").Replace(format, "");//remove literalsDi2015NewLine  if(format.Contains("H"))Di2015NewLine    return format.Contains("h") ? HourRepType.Both : HourRepType.TwentyFour;Di2015NewLine  return  format.Contains("h") ? HourRepType.Twelve : HourRepType.None;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12392767Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsSubMatrix(int[][] a, int[][] b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     for (int i = 0; i < a.Length - b.Length + 1; i++)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         for (int j = 0; j < a[0].Length - b[0].Length + 1; j++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              bool found = true;Di2015NewLine              for (int k = 0; k < b.Length; ++k)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                  for (int l = 0; l < b[0].Length; ++l)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                      if (a[i + k][j + l] != b[k][l])Di2015NewLine                      {Di2015NewLine                          found = false;Di2015NewLine                          break;Di2015NewLine                      }Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  if (!found) break;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if (found) return true;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine      }          Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

12396458Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class IsNullHelper<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Predicate<T> CreatePredicate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the default is not null, thenDi2015NewLine        // set to false.Di2015NewLine        if (((object) default(T)) != null) return t => false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the expression that checks and return.Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression p = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T), "t");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare to null.Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression equals = Expression.Equal(p, Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(null, typeof(T)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the lambda and return.Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Predicate<T>>(equals, p).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static readonly Predicate<T> IsNull = CreatePredicate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12398180Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Copy(string src, string dest)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // copy all filesDi2015NewLine    foreach (string file in Directory.GetFiles(src))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            File.Copy(file, Path.Combine(dest, Path.GetFileName(file)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (PathTooLongException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // catch any other exception that you want.Di2015NewLine        // List of possible exceptions here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c6cfw35a.aspxDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // go recursive on directoriesDi2015NewLine    foreach (string dir in Directory.GetDirectories(src))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First create directory...Di2015NewLine        // Instead of new DirectoryInfo(dir).Name, you can use any other way to get the dir name,Di2015NewLine        // but not Path.GetDirectoryName, since it returns full dir name.Di2015NewLine        string destSubDir = Path.Combine(dest, new DirectoryInfo(dir).Name);Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(destSubDir);Di2015NewLine        // and then go recursiveDi2015NewLine        Copy(dir, destSubDir);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12401937Di2015UniqueSeparator  using System;Di2015NewLine  using System.Timers;Di2015NewLine  using System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class SwitchForms : IDisposableDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private Form Form1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Form Form2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private System.Timers.Timer VisibilityTimer { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SwitchForms(Form form1, Form form2, double hideMinutes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Form1 = form1;Di2015NewLine        Form2 = form2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        VisibilityTimer = new System.Timers.Timer(hideMinutes * 60.0 * 1000.0);Di2015NewLine        VisibilityTimer.Elapsed += VisibilityTimer_Elapsed;Di2015NewLine        VisibilityTimer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Could also consider subscribing to the close events of both forms here to disable the TimerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Form1.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => Form1.Show()));Di2015NewLine        Form2.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => Form2.Hide()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void VisibilityTimer_Elapsed(object source, ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(Form1 == null || Form2 == null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        VisibilityTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (Form1.IsDisposed || Form2.IsDisposed)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        VisibilityTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine        Form1 = null;Di2015NewLine        Form2 = null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Form1.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => { if(Form1.Visible) { Form1.Hide(); } else {Form1.Show();} }));Di2015NewLine        Form2.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => { if (Form2.Visible) { Form2.Hide(); } else { Form2.Show(); } }));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      VisibilityTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine      VisibilityTimer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12404185Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void ExecuteAssembly(string anAssemblyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assembly assembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(anAssemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in assembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsClass)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TypeAttributes atts = type.Attributes;Di2015NewLine                if ((atts & TypeAttributes.Sealed) != 0) // identify the static classesDi2015NewLine                    ExecuteEverything(type);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ExecuteEverything(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get only the public STATIC properties and methods declared in the type (i.e. not inherited)Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] props = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo[] meths = type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static Di2015NewLine            | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLine        // execute the methods which aren't property accessors (identified by IsSpecialMethod = true)Di2015NewLine        foreach (MethodInfo aMeth in meths)Di2015NewLine            if (!aMeth.IsSpecialName)Di2015NewLine                Execute(aMeth, type);Di2015NewLine        // for each property get the value and recursively execute everythingDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo aProp in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object aValue = aProp.GetValue(type, null);Di2015NewLine            if (aValue != null)Di2015NewLine                RecursivelyExecuteEverything(aValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RecursivelyExecuteEverything(object aValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = aValue.GetType();Di2015NewLine        // get only the public INSTANCE properties and methods declared in the type (i.e. not inherited)Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] props = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo[] meths = type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.InstanceDi2015NewLine            | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLine        // execute the methods which aren't property accessors (identified by IsSpecialMethod = true)Di2015NewLine        foreach (MethodInfo aMeth in meths)Di2015NewLine            if (!aMeth.IsSpecialName)Di2015NewLine                Execute(aMeth, aValue);Di2015NewLine        // for each property get the value and recursively execute everythingDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo aProp in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object newValue = aProp.GetValue(aValue, null);Di2015NewLine            if (newValue != null)Di2015NewLine                RecursivelyExecuteEverything(newValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Execute(MethodInfo aMeth, object anObj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // be careful that here you should take care of the parameters. Di2015NewLine        // this version doesn't work for Method2 in Service2, since it Di2015NewLine        // requires an int as parameterDi2015NewLine        aMeth.Invoke(anObj, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12405150Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IQueryable<T> Filter<T>(IQueryable<T> col, T filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var pi in typeof(T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pi.GetValue(filter) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "t");Di2015NewLine            var body = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                Expression.PropertyOrField(param, pi.Name),Di2015NewLine                Expression.PropertyOrField(Expression.Constant(filter), pi.Name));Di2015NewLine            var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine            col = col.Where(lambda);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return col;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12406761Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void HandleOptimisticConcurrencyException(ObjectContext context, OptimisticConcurrencyException ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string msg = @"The data has changed while you were editing it.Di2015NewLineIf you save, your changes will override the previous ones.Di2015NewLineIf you don't, your changes will be lost.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDo you want to save your changes ?";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ret = System.Windows.MessageBox.Show(msg, "Concurrency error...", MessageBoxButton.YesNo, MessageBoxImage.Warning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ret ==  MessageBoxResult.Yes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.StateEntries != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in ex.StateEntries)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Refresh(RefreshMode.ClientWins, item.Entity);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.StateEntries != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in ex.StateEntries)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Refresh(RefreshMode.StoreWins, item.Entity);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (OptimisticConcurrencyException ex2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ret == MessageBoxResult.Yes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in ex2.StateEntries)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    context.Refresh(RefreshMode.ClientWins, item.Entity);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in ex2.StateEntries)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    context.Refresh(RefreshMode.StoreWins, item.Entity);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12406942Di2015UniqueSeparator//why make these for every item?Di2015NewLinevar converter = new System.Windows.Media.BrushConverter(); Di2015NewLinevar brush = (System.Windows.Media.Brush)converter.ConvertFromString("#FFB1D100"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var x in GraphPanel.Children) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    //this is tidier, but what if it's not a Path, is that possible?Di2015NewLine    var path = (Path)x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //jump out here if it's not the right type, reduces nesting and removes one comparisonDi2015NewLine    if(!(path.Data is System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry)) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         if (path.IsMouseOver)Di2015NewLine         { Di2015NewLine            listViewPoints.SelectedItems.Add(listViewPoints.Items[PointIndex]); Di2015NewLine            path.Stroke = brush; Di2015NewLine            path.StrokeThickness = 8;      Di2015NewLine            if (listViewPoints.SelectedItems.Count == 2) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 double ptAX = ((Points)listViewPoints.SelectedItems[0]).A; Di2015NewLine                 double ptAY = ((Points)listViewPoints.SelectedItems[0]).B; Di2015NewLine                 double ptBX = ((Points)listViewPoints.SelectedItems[1]).A; Di2015NewLine                 double ptBY = ((Points)listViewPoints.SelectedItems[1]).B; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 //you're going to square these, so negatives don't matterDi2015NewLine                 double diffX = ptAX - ptBX;Di2015NewLine                 double diffY = ptAY - ptBY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 //the distance between the points = sqr/-diff in x squared + diff in y squared Di2015NewLine                 //don't use Math.Pow for squaringDi2015NewLine                 double result = Math.Sqrt(diffX*diffX + diffY*diffY); Di2015NewLine                 CalculatedDistanceApart.Content = "Distance Apart: " + result + "'"; Di2015NewLine                 //are we done now?Di2015NewLine             } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        PointIndex++; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    catch { } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

12407285Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetTerms(Analyzer analyzer, string keywords)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tokenStream = analyzer.TokenStream("content", new StringReader(keywords));Di2015NewLine    var termAttribute = tokenStream.AddAttribute<ITermAttribute>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var terms = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (tokenStream.IncrementToken())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var term = termAttribute.Term;Di2015NewLine        if (!terms.Contains(term))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            terms.Add(term);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return terms;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12407655Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double[] array = new double[200 * 1000 * 1000];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        array[i] = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        Serial(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serial: {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        ParallelFor(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Parallel.For: {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        ParallelForDegreeOfParallelism(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Parallel.For (degree of parallelism): {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        CustomParallel(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Custom parallel: {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        CustomParallelExtractedMax(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Custom parallel (extracted max): {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        CustomParallelExtractedMaxHalfParallelism(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Custom parallel (extracted max, half parallelism): {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        CustomParallelFalseSharing(array, 2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Custom parallel (false sharing): {0:f2} s", sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Serial(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array[i] = array[i] * factor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void ParallelFor(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Parallel.For(Di2015NewLine        0, array.Length, i => { array[i] = array[i] * factor; });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void ParallelForDegreeOfParallelism(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Parallel.For(Di2015NewLine        0, array.Length, new ParallelOptions { MaxDegreeOfParallelism = Environment.ProcessorCount },Di2015NewLine        i => { array[i] = array[i] * factor; });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void CustomParallel(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var degreeOfParallelism = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tasks = new Task[degreeOfParallelism];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int taskNumber = 0; taskNumber < degreeOfParallelism; taskNumber++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // capturing taskNumber in lambda wouldn't work correctlyDi2015NewLine        int taskNumberCopy = taskNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tasks[taskNumber] = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = array.Length * taskNumberCopy / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                    i < array.Length * (taskNumberCopy + 1) / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                    i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    array[i] = array[i] * factor;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void CustomParallelExtractedMax(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var degreeOfParallelism = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tasks = new Task[degreeOfParallelism];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int taskNumber = 0; taskNumber < degreeOfParallelism; taskNumber++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // capturing taskNumber in lambda wouldn't work correctlyDi2015NewLine        int taskNumberCopy = taskNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tasks[taskNumber] = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var max = array.Length * (taskNumberCopy + 1) / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = array.Length * taskNumberCopy / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                    i < max;Di2015NewLine                    i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    array[i] = array[i] * factor;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void CustomParallelExtractedMaxHalfParallelism(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var degreeOfParallelism = Environment.ProcessorCount / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tasks = new Task[degreeOfParallelism];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int taskNumber = 0; taskNumber < degreeOfParallelism; taskNumber++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // capturing taskNumber in lambda wouldn't work correctlyDi2015NewLine        int taskNumberCopy = taskNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tasks[taskNumber] = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var max = array.Length * (taskNumberCopy + 1) / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = array.Length * taskNumberCopy / degreeOfParallelism;Di2015NewLine                    i < max;Di2015NewLine                    i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    array[i] = array[i] * factor;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void CustomParallelFalseSharing(double[] array, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var degreeOfParallelism = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tasks = new Task[degreeOfParallelism];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int taskNumber = 0; taskNumber < degreeOfParallelism; taskNumber++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tasks[taskNumber] = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int j = Interlocked.Increment(ref i);Di2015NewLine                while (j < array.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    array[j] = array[j] * factor;Di2015NewLine                    j = Interlocked.Increment(ref i);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12411189Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FixedSizeQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineprivate readonly List<T> queue = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineprivate readonly object syncObj = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int Size { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic FixedSizeQueue(int size) { Size = size; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Enqueue(T obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (syncObj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.Insert(0,obj)Di2015NewLine        if(queue.Count > Size) Di2015NewLine           queue.RemoveRange(Size, Count-Size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic T[] Dequeue()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (syncObj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = queue.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12411247Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string SubstringWithinUtf8Limit(string text, int byteLimit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int byteCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    char[] buffer = new char[1];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[0] = text[i];Di2015NewLine        byteCount += Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount(buffer);Di2015NewLine        if (byteCount > byteLimit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Couldn't add this character. Return its indexDi2015NewLine            return text.Substring(0, i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return text;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12414943Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> listTimes = new List<string>() { "09.00 AM", "12.00 PM", "03.00 PM" };Di2015NewLinestring testTimeString = "01.00 PM";Di2015NewLineDateTime testTime = DateTime.ParseExact(testTimeString, "hh.mm tt", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDateTime closestTime = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLineTimeSpan closestDifference = TimeSpan.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (string item in listTimes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime itemTime = DateTime.ParseExact(item, "hh.mm tt", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan itemDifference = (itemTime - testTime).Duration();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (itemDifference < closestDifference)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        closestTime = itemTime;Di2015NewLine        closestDifference = itemDifference;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn closestTime.ToString("hh.mm tt");Di2015NewLine

12416150Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool AmISelected(TreeNode root, string myString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool bfound = false;Di2015NewLine        if (root.Text == myString)Di2015NewLine            bfound = true;// I do have myStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = root.Nodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            if (AmISelected(root.Nodes[i], myString))Di2015NewLine                bfound = true;// I've a child who have myStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!bfound) //if i don't have myString neither any of my childrenDi2015NewLine            if (root.Parent == null) // is it a root nodeDi2015NewLine                treeView2.Nodes.Remove(root);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                root.Parent.Nodes.Remove(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bfound;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12420416Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void UploadButton_Click(Object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (FileUpload1.HasFile && Path.GetExtension(FileUpload1.FileName) == ".xlsx")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var excel = new ExcelPackage(FileUpload1.PostedFile.InputStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tbl = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            var ws = excel.Workbook.Worksheets.First();Di2015NewLine            var hasHeader = true;  // adjust accordinglyDi2015NewLine            // add DataColumns to DataTableDi2015NewLine            foreach (var firstRowCell in ws.Cells[1, 1, 1, ws.Dimension.End.Column])Di2015NewLine                tbl.Columns.Add(hasHeader ? firstRowCell.TextDi2015NewLine                    : String.Format("Column {0}", firstRowCell.Start.Column));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add DataRows to DataTableDi2015NewLine            int startRow = hasHeader ? 2 : 1;Di2015NewLine            for (int rowNum = startRow; rowNum <= ws.Dimension.End.Row; rowNum++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var wsRow = ws.Cells[rowNum, 1, rowNum, ws.Dimension.End.Column];Di2015NewLine                DataRow row = tbl.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var cell in wsRow)Di2015NewLine                    row[cell.Start.Column - 1] = cell.Text;Di2015NewLine                tbl.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var msg = String.Format("DataTable successfully created from excel-file. Colum-count:{0} Row-count:{1}",Di2015NewLine                                    tbl.Columns.Count, tbl.Rows.Count);Di2015NewLine            UploadStatusLabel.Text = msg;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UploadStatusLabel.Text = "You did not specify a file to upload.";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12420416Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub UploadButton_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs)Di2015NewLine    If (FileUpload1.HasFile AndAlso IO.Path.GetExtension(FileUpload1.FileName) = ".xlsx") ThenDi2015NewLine        Using excel = New ExcelPackage(FileUpload1.PostedFile.InputStream)Di2015NewLine            Dim tbl = New DataTable()Di2015NewLine            Dim ws = excel.Workbook.Worksheets.First()Di2015NewLine            Dim hasHeader = True ' change it if required 'Di2015NewLine            ' create DataColumns 'Di2015NewLine            For Each firstRowCell In ws.Cells(1, 1, 1, ws.Dimension.End.Column)Di2015NewLine                tbl.Columns.Add(If(hasHeader,Di2015NewLine                                   firstRowCell.Text,Di2015NewLine                                   String.Format("Column {0}", firstRowCell.Start.Column)))Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine            ' add rows to DataTable 'Di2015NewLine            Dim startRow = If(hasHeader, 2, 1)Di2015NewLine            For rowNum = startRow To ws.Dimension.End.RowDi2015NewLine                Dim wsRow = ws.Cells(rowNum, 1, rowNum, ws.Dimension.End.Column)Di2015NewLine                Dim row = tbl.NewRow()Di2015NewLine                For Each cell In wsRowDi2015NewLine                    row(cell.Start.Column - 1) = cell.TextDi2015NewLine                NextDi2015NewLine                tbl.Rows.Add(row)Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine            Dim msg = String.Format("DataTable successfully created from excel-file Colum-count:{0} Row-count:{1}",Di2015NewLine                                    tbl.Columns.Count, tbl.Rows.Count)Di2015NewLine            UploadStatusLabel.Text = msgDi2015NewLine        End UsingDi2015NewLine    ElseDi2015NewLine        UploadStatusLabel.Text = "You did not specify an excel-file to upload."Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

12420569Di2015UniqueSeparator#import "Server.tlb" no_namespace // you should use namespaces! this is a demoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint _tmain(int argc, _TCHAR* argv[])Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  CoInitialize(NULL);      // init COMDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  IProxyPtr proxy(__uuidof(Proxy));         // instantiate the proxyDi2015NewLine  SAFEARRAY* orders = proxy->GetOrders();   // to return ordersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  LPUNKNOWN* punks;   Di2015NewLine  HRESULT hr = SafeArrayAccessData(orders, (void**)&punks); // direct access to SA memoryDi2015NewLine  if (SUCCEEDED(hr))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    long lLBound, lUBound;  // get array boundsDi2015NewLine    SafeArrayGetLBound(orders, 1 , &lLBound);Di2015NewLine    SafeArrayGetUBound(orders, 1, &lUBound);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long cElements = lUBound - lLBound + 1; Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < cElements; ++i)  // iterate through returned objectsDi2015NewLine    {                              Di2015NewLine      LPUNKNOWN punk = punks[i];     // for VARIANTs: punk = punks[i].punkValDi2015NewLine      IOrderPtr order(punk);         // access the object via IOrder interfaceDi2015NewLine      long q = order->GetQuantity(); // and voila!Di2015NewLine      std::cout << "order " << i + 1 << ": Quantity " << q << std::endl;Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLine    SafeArrayUnaccessData(orders);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  SafeArrayDestroy(orders);Di2015NewLine  return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12420603Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string GetCorrectPropertyName<T>(Expression<Func<T, Object>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Body is MemberExpression) {Di2015NewLine            return ((MemberExpression)expression.Body).Member.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            var op = ((UnaryExpression)expression.Body).Operand;Di2015NewLine            return ((MemberExpression)op).Member.Name;Di2015NewLine        }                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12420603Di2015UniqueSeparator   Public Shared Function GetCorrectPropertyName(Of T) _Di2015NewLine                (ByVal expression As Expression(Of Func(Of T, Object))) As StringDi2015NewLine        If TypeOf expression.Body Is MemberExpression ThenDi2015NewLine            Return DirectCast(expression.Body, MemberExpression).Member.NameDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            Dim op = (CType(expression.Body, UnaryExpression).Operand)Di2015NewLine            Return DirectCast(op, MemberExpression).Member.NameDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine
12420614Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    delegate void update();Di2015NewLine    static event update updateEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Parent thread: " + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine        updateEvent += new update(Test_updateEvent);Di2015NewLine        var t = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Task thread: " + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine                updateEvent();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        t.Wait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Test_updateEvent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Event thread: " + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12420702Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Index i is declared as static so that both the threads have only one copyDi2015NewLine    static int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static AutoResetEvent parentEvent = new AutoResetEvent(true);Di2015NewLine    static AutoResetEvent childEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread t = new Thread(WriteY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Start thread YDi2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLine        // Print X on the main threadDi2015NewLine        parentEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        while (i < 100)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            if (i % 10 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                childEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine                parentEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(i + ":Y ");Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        t.Join();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void WriteY()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        childEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        while (i < 100)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i % 10 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parentEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine                childEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(i + ":X ");Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12420962Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid OnMyEvent()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (MyEvent!= null)                // Thread A checks event Di2015NewLine  {                                  // Thread B unsubscribes _last_ handler Di2015NewLine    MyEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty);  // Boom!Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12420962Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid OnMyEvent()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var myEvent = MyEvent;             // Thread A gets _copy_ of invocation listDi2015NewLine  if (myEvent != null)               // Using copy, so no problem Di2015NewLine  {                                  // Thread B unsubscribes _last_ handlerDi2015NewLine    myEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty);  // Still using copy, so no problem Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12424367Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected IEnumerable<T> FetchData<T>(Func<IDataReader, T> processor, String query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var connection = CreateConnection())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connection.ConnectionString = ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var command = connection.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (IDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (reader.read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return processor(reader);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineclass Sample<R> : ICovariant<R> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ICovariant<Object> iobj = new Sample<Object>();Di2015NewLine        ICovariant<String> istr = new Sample<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // You can assign istr to iobj because Di2015NewLine        // the ICovariant interface is covariant.Di2015NewLine        iobj = istr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12424961Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Line>> Group(IEnumerable<Line> horizontalLines, IEnumerable<Line> verticalLines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Clean the input lists here. I'll leave the implementation up to you.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var ungroupedLines = new HashSet<Line>(horizontalLines.Concat(verticalLines));Di2015NewLine  var groupedLines = new List<List<Line>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (ungroupedLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var group = new List<Line>();Di2015NewLine    var unprocessedLines = new HashSet<Line>();Di2015NewLine    unprocessedLines.Add(ungroupedLines.TakeFirst());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (unprocessedLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var line = unprocessedLines.TakeFirst();Di2015NewLine      group.Add(line);Di2015NewLine      unprocessedLines.AddRange(ungroupedLines.TakeIntersectingLines(line));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    groupedLines.Add(group);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return groupedLines;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class GroupingExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static T TakeFirst<T>(this HashSet<T> set)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var item = set.First();Di2015NewLine    set.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine    return item;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IEnumerable<Line> TakeIntersectingLines(this HashSet<Line> lines, Line line)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var intersectedLines = lines.Where(l => l.Intersects(line)).ToList();Di2015NewLine    lines.RemoveRange(intersectedLines);Di2015NewLine    return intersectedLines;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void RemoveRange<T>(this HashSet<T> set, IEnumerable<T> itemsToRemove)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    foreach(var item in itemsToRemove)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      set.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void AddRange<T>(this HashSet<T> set, IEnumerable<T> itemsToAdd)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    foreach(var item in itemsToAdd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      set.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12424961Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Intersects(Line other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Whether this line intersects the other line or not.Di2015NewLine  // I'll leave the implementation up to you.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12424961Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Line>> Group(IEnumerable<Line> horizontalLines, IEnumerable<Line> verticalLines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Clean the input lists here. I'll leave the implementation up to you.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var ungroupedHorizontalLines = new HashSet<Line>(horizontalLines);Di2015NewLine  var ungroupedVerticalLines = new HashSet<Line>(verticalLines);Di2015NewLine  var groupedLines = new List<List<Line>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (ungroupedHorizontalLines.Count + ungroupedVerticalLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var group = new List<Line>();Di2015NewLine    var unprocessedHorizontalLines = new HashSet<Line>();Di2015NewLine    var unprocessedVerticalLines = new HashSet<Line>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ungroupedHorizontalLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      unprocessedHorizontalLines.Add(ungroupedHorizontalLines.TakeFirst());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      unprocessedVerticalLines.Add(ungroupedVerticalLines.TakeFirst());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (unprocessedHorizontalLines.Count + unprocessedVerticalLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      while (unprocessedHorizontalLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var line = unprocessedHorizontalLines.TakeFirst();Di2015NewLine        group.Add(line);Di2015NewLine                unprocessedVerticalLines.AddRange(ungroupedVerticalLines.TakeIntersectingLines(line));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      while (unprocessedVerticalLines.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var line = unprocessedVerticalLines.TakeFirst();Di2015NewLine        group.Add(line);Di2015NewLine        unprocessedHorizontalLines.AddRange(ungroupedHorizontalLines.TakeIntersectingLines(line));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    groupedLines.Add(group);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return groupedLines;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12425463Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int[] counts = new int[20];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string newLine = Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (int.TryParse(this.textBox1.Text, out n))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Clear the boxDi2015NewLine            this.textBox2.Text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var generatedList = new int[n];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Upper bound is EXCLUSIVEDi2015NewLine                var gen = r.Next(1, 21);Di2015NewLine                counts[gen - 1]++;Di2015NewLine                generatedList[i] = gen;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.textBox2.Text += PrintNumbers(generatedList);Di2015NewLine            this.textBox2.Text += PrintCounts(this.counts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.textBox2.Text = "Invalid input! Cannot generate numbers.";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string PrintNumbers(int[] numbers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (numbers == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "No numbers generated" + newLine;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string result = "Generated sequence: {";Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result += numbers[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i < numbers.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result += ", ";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result + "}" + newLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string PrintCounts(int[] counts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (counts == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < counts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result += "Number " + (i + 1) + " generated " + counts[i] + " times." + newLine;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

private void DrawPipe(Graphics g, float width, PointF p1, PointF p2, Color mid_color, Color edge_color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SizeF along=new SizeF(p2.X-p1.X, p2.Y-p1.Y);Di2015NewLine        float mag=(float)Math.Sqrt(along.Width*along.Width+along.Height*along.Height);Di2015NewLine        along=new SizeF(along.Width/mag, along.Height/mag);Di2015NewLine        SizeF perp=new SizeF(-along.Height, along.Width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PointF p1L=new PointF(p1.X+width/2*perp.Width, p1.Y+width/2*perp.Height);Di2015NewLine        PointF p1R=new p1R});Di2015NewLine        gp.CloseFigure();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Region region=new Region(gp);Di2015NewLine        using(LinearGradientBrush brush=new LinearGradientBrush(Di2015NewLine            p1L, p1R, Color.Black, Color.Black))Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            ColorBlend color_blend=new ColorBlend();Di2015NewLine            color_blend.Colors=new          g.FillRegion(brush, region);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12428250Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtensions {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IEnumerable<T> Cached<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source) {Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    return new CachedEnumerable<T>(source);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CachedEnumerable<T> : IEnumerable<T> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly Object gate = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly IEnumerable<T> source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly List<T> cache = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  IEnumerator<T> enumerator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  bool isCacheComplete;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public CachedEnumerable(IEnumerable<T> source) {Di2015NewLine    this.source = source;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine    lock (this.gate) {Di2015NewLine      if (this.isCacheComplete)Di2015NewLine        return this.cache.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine      if (this.enumerator == null)Di2015NewLine        this.enumerator = source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return GetCacheBuildingEnumerator();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IEnumerator<T> GetCacheBuildingEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine    var index = 0;Di2015NewLine    T item;Di2015NewLine    while (TryGetItem(index, out item)) {Di2015NewLine      yield return item;Di2015NewLine      index += 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  bool TryGetItem(Int32 index, out T item) {Di2015NewLine    lock (this.gate) {Di2015NewLine      if (!IsItemInCache(index)) {Di2015NewLine        // The iteration may have completed while waiting for the lock.Di2015NewLine        if (this.isCacheComplete) {Di2015NewLine          item = default(T);Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!this.enumerator.MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine          item = default(T);Di2015NewLine          this.isCacheComplete = true;Di2015NewLine          this.enumerator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.cache.Add(this.enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      item = this.cache[index];Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  bool IsItemInCache(Int32 index) {Di2015NewLine    return index < this.cache.Count;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine    return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12433013Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static SortedList<int, T> MultiIntersect<T>(params SortedList<int, T>[] lists) {Di2015NewLine  SortedList<int, T> result = new SortedList<int, T>();Di2015NewLine  int[] index = new int[lists.Length];Di2015NewLine  bool cont;Di2015NewLine  do {Di2015NewLine    int list = 0;Di2015NewLine    int value = lists[list].Keys[index[list]];Di2015NewLine    while (list < lists.Length) {Di2015NewLine      while (index[list] < lists[list].Count && lists[list].Keys[index[list]] < value) index[list]++;Di2015NewLine      if (index[list] == lists[list].Count) {Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine      } else if (lists[list].Keys[index[list]] > value) {Di2015NewLine        value = lists[list].Keys[index[list]];Di2015NewLine        list = 0;Di2015NewLine      } else {Di2015NewLine        list++;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    result.Add(value, lists[0].Values[index[0]]);Di2015NewLine    cont = true;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < index.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      index[i]++;Di2015NewLine      cont &= index[i] < lists[i].Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } while(cont);Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12434699Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RepeatCall(int numberOfCalls, Action unitOfWork)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= numberOfCalls; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unitOfWork();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (...)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // decide which exceptions/faults should be retried and Di2015NewLine            // which should be thrownDi2015NewLine            // and always throw when i == numberOfCallsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

12437664Di2015UniqueSeparator        using System;Di2015NewLine        using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine        using System.Linq;Di2015NewLine        using System.Text;Di2015NewLine        using System.Data;Di2015NewLine        using System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLine        using System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        namespace CommonDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public static class DataTableExtensionsDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                public static DataTable ConvertToDataTable<T>(this IList<T> data)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PropertyDescriptorCollection properties =Di2015NewLine                        TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                    DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine                    foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine                        table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(prop.PropertyType) ?? prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                    foreach (T item in data)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        DataRow row = table.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                        foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine                            row[prop.Name] = prop.GetValue(item) ?? DBNull.Value;Di2015NewLine                        table.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    table.AcceptChanges();Di2015NewLine                    return table;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                public static DataRow ConvertToDataRow<T>(this T item, DataTable table)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PropertyDescriptorCollection properties =Di2015NewLine                        TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                    DataRow row = table.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                    foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine                        row[prop.Name] = prop.GetValue(item) ?? DBNull.Value;Di2015NewLine                    return row;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                public static T ConvertToEntity<T>(this DataRow tableRow) where T : new()Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create a new type of the entity I wantDi2015NewLine                    Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine                    T returnObject = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (DataColumn col in tableRow.Table.Columns)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string colName = col.ColumnName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Look for the object's property with the columns name, ignore caseDi2015NewLine                        PropertyInfo pInfo = t.GetProperty(colName.ToLower(),Di2015NewLine                            BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // did we find the property ?Di2015NewLine                        if (pInfo != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            object val = tableRow[colName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // is this a Nullable<> typeDi2015NewLine                            bool IsNullable = (Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(pInfo.PropertyType) != null);Di2015NewLine                            if (IsNullable)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (val is System.DBNull)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    val = null;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    // Convert the db type into the T we have in our Nullable<T> typeDi2015NewLine                                    val = Convert.ChangeType(val, Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(pInfo.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                // Convert the db type into the type of the property in our entityDi2015NewLine                                SetDefaultValue(ref val, pInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                                if (pInfo.PropertyType.IsEnum && !pInfo.PropertyType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    val = Enum.ToObject(pInfo.PropertyType, val);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                    val = Convert.ChangeType(val, pInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            // Set the value of the property with the value from the dbDi2015NewLine                            if (pInfo.CanWrite)Di2015NewLine                                pInfo.SetValue(returnObject, val, null);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // return the entity object with valuesDi2015NewLine                    return returnObject;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                private static void SetDefaultValue(ref object val, Type propertyType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (val is DBNull)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        val = GetDefault(propertyType);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                public static object GetDefault(Type type)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (type.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                public static List<T> ConvertToList<T>(this DataTable table) where T : new()Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Create a list of the entities we want to returnDi2015NewLine                    List<T> returnObject = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Iterate through the DataTable's rowsDi2015NewLine                    foreach (DataRow dr in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Convert each row into an entity object and add to the listDi2015NewLine                        T newRow = dr.ConvertToEntity<T>();Di2015NewLine                        returnObject.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Return the finished listDi2015NewLine                    return returnObject;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12443975Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Copies an image from the internet (http protocol) locally to the AppData LocalFolder.  This is used by some methods Di2015NewLine    /// (like the SecondaryTile constructor) that do not support referencing images over http but can reference them using Di2015NewLine    /// the ms-appdata protocol.  Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="internetUri">The path (URI) to the image on the internet</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="uniqueName">A unique name for the local file</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Path to the image that has been copied locally</returns>Di2015NewLine    private async Task<Uri> GetLocalImageAsync(string internetUri, string uniqueName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(internetUri))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var response = await HttpWebRequest.CreateHttp(internetUri).GetResponseAsync())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var stream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var desiredName = string.Format("{0}.jpg", uniqueName);Di2015NewLine                var file = await ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder.CreateFileAsync(desiredName, CreationCollisionOption.ReplaceExisting);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (var filestream = await file.OpenStreamForWriteAsync())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    await stream.CopyToAsync(filestream);Di2015NewLine                    return new Uri(string.Format("ms-appdata:///local/{0}.jpg", uniqueName), UriKind.Absolute);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
12444117Di2015UniqueSeparatorDebuggerDisplay
12444117Di2015UniqueSeparator// http://blogs.msdn.com/b/jaredpar/archive/2010/02/19/flattening-class-hierarchies-when-debugging-c.aspxDi2015NewLine// by Jared ParDi2015NewLineinternal sealed class FlattenHierarchyProxy {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DebuggerDisplay("{Value}", Name = "{Name,nq}", Type = "{Type.ToString(),nq}")]Di2015NewLine    internal struct Member {Di2015NewLine        internal string Name;Di2015NewLine        internal object Value;Di2015NewLine        internal Type Type;Di2015NewLine        internal Member(string name, object value, Type type) {Di2015NewLine            Name = name;Di2015NewLine            Value = value;Di2015NewLine            Type = type;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)]Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _target;Di2015NewLine    [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)]Di2015NewLine    private Member[] _memberList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.RootHidden)]Di2015NewLine    internal Member[] Items {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if (_memberList == null) {Di2015NewLine                _memberList = BuildMemberList().ToArray();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return _memberList;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FlattenHierarchyProxy(object target) {Di2015NewLine        _target = target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<Member> BuildMemberList() {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<Member>();Di2015NewLine        if ( _target == null ) {Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var flags = BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance;Di2015NewLine        var type = _target.GetType();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var field in type.GetFields(flags)) {Di2015NewLine            var value = field.GetValue(_target);Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new Member(field.Name, value, field.FieldType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var prop in type.GetProperties(flags)) {Di2015NewLine            object value = null;Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                value = prop.GetValue(_target, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                value = ex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new Member(prop.Name, value, prop.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12444117Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn list.OrderBy(m => m.Name).ToList();Di2015NewLine

12444542Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class urlmonMimeDetectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(@"urlmon.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine    private extern static System.UInt32 FindMimeFromData(Di2015NewLine        System.UInt32 pBC,Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPStr)] System.String pwzUrl,Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray)] byte[] pBuffer,Di2015NewLine        System.UInt32 cbSize,Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPStr)] System.String pwzMimeProposed,Di2015NewLine        System.UInt32 dwMimeFlags,Di2015NewLine        out System.UInt32 ppwzMimeOut,Di2015NewLine        System.UInt32 dwReserverdDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string GetMimeFromFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(filename))Di2015NewLine        throw new FileNotFoundException(filename + " not found");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[256];Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(filename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (fs.Length >= 256)Di2015NewLine            fs.Read(buffer, 0, 256);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            fs.Read(buffer, 0, (int)fs.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.UInt32 mimetype;Di2015NewLine        FindMimeFromData(0, null, buffer, 256, null, 0, out mimetype, 0);Di2015NewLine        System.IntPtr mimeTypePtr = new IntPtr(mimetype);Di2015NewLine        string mime = Marshal.PtrToStringUni(mimeTypePtr);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(mimeTypePtr);Di2015NewLine        return mime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "unknown/unknown";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12444542Di2015UniqueSeparator   public MimeType GetMimeTypeFromFile(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sbyte[] fileData = null;Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream srcFile = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = new byte[srcFile.Length];Di2015NewLine            srcFile.Read(data, 0, (Int32)srcFile.Length);Di2015NewLine            fileData = Winista.Mime.SupportUtil.ToSByteArray(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MimeType oMimeType = GetMimeType(fileData);Di2015NewLine        if (oMimeType != null) return oMimeType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //We haven't found the file using Magic (eg a text/plain file)Di2015NewLine        //so instead use URLMon to try and get the files formatDi2015NewLine        Winista.MimeDetect.URLMONMimeDetect.urlmonMimeDetect urlmonMimeDetect = new Winista.MimeDetect.URLMONMimeDetect.urlmonMimeDetect();Di2015NewLine        string urlmonMimeType = urlmonMimeDetect.GetMimeFromFile(filePath);Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(urlmonMimeType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (MimeType mimeType in types)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (mimeType.Name == urlmonMimeType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return mimeType;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return oMimeType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12445376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class ScannableStringBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract int Length { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract char this[int index] { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int PositionOfTheSecondWord()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine        int state = 0;Di2015NewLine        char c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int length = this.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (pos <= length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            c = this[pos];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c == ' ' || c == '\\n') // spaceDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (state == 1)Di2015NewLine                    state = 2; // 2 means the space between the first and the second word has begunDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else // a letterDi2015NewLine                if (state == 0)Di2015NewLine                    state = 1; // 1 means the first word has begunDi2015NewLine                if (state == 2)Di2015NewLine                    return pos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12445376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ScannableString : ScannableStringBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ScannableString(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.stringValue = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly string stringValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Length {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return stringValue.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override char this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return stringValue[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ScannableStringBuilder : ScannableStringBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ScannableString(stringBuilder value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.stringBuilder = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly string stringBuilder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Length {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return stringBuilder.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override char this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return stringBuilder[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12446930Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap
12446930Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap
