12446930Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing Application = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WordDocStatsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // General idea is based on: http://stackoverflow.com/a/7937590/700926Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Open a doc fileDi2015NewLine            var wordApplication = new Application();Di2015NewLine            var document = wordApplication.Documents.Open(@"C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\document.docx");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Load the image to compare against.Di2015NewLine            var bitmapToCompareAgainst = new Bitmap(@"C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\image.png");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // For each inline shape, do a comparisonDi2015NewLine            // By inspection you can see that the first inline shape have index 1 ( and not zero as one might expect )Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 1; i <= wordApplication.ActiveDocument.InlineShapes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // closureDi2015NewLine                // http://confluence.jetbrains.net/display/ReSharper/Access+to+modified+closureDi2015NewLine                var inlineShapeId = i; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // parameterized thread startDi2015NewLine                // http://stackoverflow.com/a/1195915/700926Di2015NewLine                var thread = new Thread(() => CompareInlineShapeAndBitmap(inlineShapeId, bitmapToCompareAgainst, wordApplication));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // STA is needed in order to access the clipboardDi2015NewLine                // http://stackoverflow.com/a/518724/700926Di2015NewLine                thread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine                thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                thread.Join();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Close wordDi2015NewLine            wordApplication.Quit();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // General idea is based on: http://stackoverflow.com/a/7937590/700926Di2015NewLine        protected static void CompareInlineShapeAndBitmap(int inlineShapeId, Bitmap bitmapToCompareAgainst, Application wordApplication)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the shape, select, and copy it to the clipboardDi2015NewLine            var inlineShape = wordApplication.ActiveDocument.InlineShapes[inlineShapeId];Di2015NewLine            inlineShape.Select();Di2015NewLine            wordApplication.Selection.Copy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check data is in the clipboardDi2015NewLine            if (Clipboard.GetDataObject() != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var data = Clipboard.GetDataObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Check if the data conforms to a bitmap formatDi2015NewLine                if (data != null && data.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.Bitmap))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Fetch the image and convert it to a BitmapDi2015NewLine                    var image = (Image)data.GetData(DataFormats.Bitmap, true);Di2015NewLine                    var currentBitmap = new Bitmap(image);Di2015NewLine                    var imagesAreEqual = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compare the images - first by size and then pixel by pixelDi2015NewLine                    // Based on: http://www.c-sharpcorner.com/uploadfile/prathore/image-comparison-using-C-Sharp/Di2015NewLine                    if(currentBitmap.Width == bitmapToCompareAgainst.Width && currentBitmap.Height == bitmapToCompareAgainst.Height)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (var i = 0; i < currentBitmap.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if(!imagesAreEqual)Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            for (var j = 0; j < currentBitmap.Height; j++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (currentBitmap.GetPixel(i, j).Equals(bitmapToCompareAgainst.GetPixel(i, j)))Di2015NewLine                                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                imagesAreEqual = false;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        imagesAreEqual = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Inline shape #{0} is equal to the 'external' bitmap: {1}", inlineShapeId, imagesAreEqual);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Clipboard data is not in an image format");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Clipboard is empty");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

// change to CUR file typeDi2015NewLine            buffer[10] = hotspotx;Di2015NewLine            buffer[12] = hotspoty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, (int)s.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ms;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Stream GetCURFromICOAlternativeMethod(Uri uri, byte hotspotx, byte hotspoty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamResourceInfo sri = Application.GetResourceStream(uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Stream s = sri.Stream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte []buffer = new byte[s.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0); // always 0Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(2); // change file type to CURDi2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(1); // 1 icon in tableDi2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s.Position = 6; // skip over first 6 bytes in ICO as we just wroteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s.Read(buffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(hotspotx);Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(hotspoty);Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s.Position += 4; // skip 4 bytes as we just wrote our ownDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int remaining = (int)s.Length - 14;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s.Read(buffer, 0, remaining);Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, remaining);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ms;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WordDocStatsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // General idea is based on: http://stackoverflow.com/a/7937590/700926Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Open a doc fileDi2015NewLine            var wordApplication = new Application();Di2015NewLine            var document = wordApplication.Documents.Open(@"C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\document.docx");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // For each inline shape, export it to a fileDi2015NewLine            // By inspection you can see that the first inline shape have index 1 ( and not zero as one might expect )Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 1; i <= wordApplication.ActiveDocument.InlineShapes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // closureDi2015NewLine                // http://confluence.jetbrains.net/display/ReSharper/Access+to+modified+closureDi2015NewLine                var inlineShapeId = i; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // parameterized thread startDi2015NewLine                // http://stackoverflow.com/a/1195915/700926Di2015NewLine                var thread = new Thread(() => SaveInlineShapeToFile(inlineShapeId, wordApplication));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // STA is needed in order to access the clipboardDi2015NewLine                // http://stackoverflow.com/a/518724/700926Di2015NewLine                thread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine                thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                thread.Join();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Close wordDi2015NewLine            wordApplication.Quit();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // General idea is based on: http://stackoverflow.com/a/7937590/700926Di2015NewLine        protected static void SaveInlineShapeToFile(int inlineShapeId, Application wordApplication)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the shape, select, and copy it to the clipboardDi2015NewLine            var inlineShape = wordApplication.ActiveDocument.InlineShapes[inlineShapeId];Di2015NewLine            inlineShape.Select();Di2015NewLine            wordApplication.Selection.Copy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check data is in the clipboardDi2015NewLine            if (Clipboard.GetDataObject() != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var data = Clipboard.GetDataObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Check if the data conforms to a bitmap formatDi2015NewLine                if (data != null && data.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.Bitmap))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Fetch the image and convert it to a BitmapDi2015NewLine                    var image = (Image) data.GetData(DataFormats.Bitmap, true);Di2015NewLine                    var currentBitmap = new Bitmap(image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Save the bitmap to a fileDi2015NewLine                    currentBitmap.Save(@"C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\" + String.Format("img_{0}.png", inlineShapeId));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12457818Di2015UniqueSeparatorLike
12457818Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var argLeft = Expression.Constant("Foobar", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    var argRight = Expression.Constant("F%b%r", typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var likeExpression = Expression.Call(typeof(StringHelper), "Like", null, argLeft, argRight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression.Lambda(likeExpression).Compile().DynamicInvoke().Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static class StringHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool Like(string toSearch, string toFind)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Regex(@"\\A" + new Regex(@"\\.|\\$|\\^|\\{|\\[|\\(|\\||\\)|\\*|\\+|\\?|\\\\").Replace(toFind, ch => @"\\" + ch)Di2015NewLine                                                                                  .Replace('_', '.')Di2015NewLine                                                                                  .Replace("%", ".*") + @"\\z", Di2015NewLine                         RegexOptions.Singleline).IsMatch(toSearch);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
